ArcaneByte - Established 2018

retro computing accessories for enthusiasts, by enthusiasts

    ArcaneByte was established in 2018 as a maker in the vintage computing space. We specialize particularly in the Apple Lisa and Macintosh XL, but offer a variety of gadgets that are compatible with other vintage systems. Check out our products below!

    Products

    adb2lisa

    Converts Apple Desktop Bus (ADB) Keyboards to the Apple Lisa and Macintosh XL

    mac2lisa

    Converts Macintosh 128k/512k/Plus Keyboards to the Apple Lisa and Macintosh

    usb2lisa

    Converts Universal Serial Bus (USB) Keyboards to the Apple Lisa and Macintosh

    WiFiModem

    ESP8266-based wireless (wifi) modem for vintage computers

    Apple Parallel Hard Drive Emulator

    A parallel hard drive emulator based on cameo/aphid
